title: Characterization of the shape-staggering effect in mercury nuclei
title_cn: 汞核中形状交错效应的表征
abstract: In rare cases, the removal of a single proton (Z) or neutron (N) from an atomic nucleus leads to a dramatic shape change. These instances are crucial for understanding the components of the nuclear interactions that drive deformation. The mercury isotopes (Z = 80) are a striking example: their close neighbours, the lead isotopes (Z = 82), are spherical and steadily shrink with decreasing N. The even-mass (A = N + Z) mercury isotopes follow this trend. The odd-mass mercury isotopes 181,183,185Hg, however, exhibit noticeably larger charge radii. Due to the experimental difficulties of probing extremely neutron-deficient systems, and the computational complexity of modelling such heavy nuclides, the microscopic origin of this unique shape staggering has remained unclear. Here, by applying resonance ionization spectroscopy, mass spectrometry and nuclear spectroscopy as far as 177Hg, we determine 181Hg as the shape-staggering endpoint. By combining our experimental measurements with Monte Carlo shell model calculations, we conclude that this phenomenon results from the interplay between monopole and quadrupole interactions driving a quantum phase transition, for which we identify the participating orbitals. Although shape staggering in the mercury isotopes is a unique and localized feature in the nuclear chart, it nicely illustrates the concurrence of single-particle and collective degrees of freedom at play in atomic nuclei.
abstract_cn: 在极少数情况下，从原子核中去除单个质子（Z）或中子（N）会导致剧烈的形状变化。这些实例对于理解驱动形变的核相互作用的组成部分至关重要。汞同位素（Z＆＃8201; =＆＃8201; 80）是一个引人注目的示例：它们的近邻铅同位素（Z＆＃8201; =＆＃8201; 82）呈球形，随着N的减小而稳定缩小。偶数（A＆＃8201; =＆＃8201; N＆＃8201; +＆＃8201; Z）汞同位素遵循这种趋势。然而，奇数汞同位素 181,183,185 Hg的电荷半径明显更大。由于探测极中子不足系统的实验困难，以及对此类重核素进行建模的计算复杂性，这种独特形状错位的微观起源仍不清楚。在这里，通过应用共振电离光谱法，质谱法和核能谱法直至 177 Hg，我们确定 181 Hg作为形状交错的终点。通过将我们的实验测量结果与蒙特卡洛壳模型计算相结合，我们得出结论，这种现象是由驱动量子相变的单极和四极相互作用之间的相互作用引起的，为此我们确定了参与轨道。尽管汞同位素的形状错位是核图中唯一且局部的特征，但它很好地说明了原子核中单粒子和集体自由度的同时存在。

title: Superradiant emission from colour centres in diamond
title_cn: 钻石色心产生的超辐射
abstract: Superradiance is a fundamental collective effect where radiation is amplified by the coherence of multiple emitters. Superradiance plays a prominent role in optics (where it enables the design of lasers with substantially reduced linewidths) and quantum mechanics, and is even used to explain cosmological observations such as Hawking radiation from black holes. Resonators coupled to spin ensembles are promising future building blocks of integrated quantum devices that will involve superradiance. As such, it is important to study its fundamental properties within such devices. Although experiments in the strong-coupling regime have shown oscillatory behaviour in these systems, a clear signature of Dicke superradiance has so far been missing. Here we explore superradiance in a system composed of a three-dimensional lumped element resonator in the fast cavity limit inductively coupled to an inhomogeneously broadened ensemble of nitrogen–vacancy centres. We observe a superradiant pulse being emitted a trillion times faster than the decay for an individual nitrogen–vacancy centre. This is further confirmed by the nonlinear scaling of the emitted radiation intensity with respect to the ensemble size. Our work provides the foundation for future quantum technologies including solid-state superradiant masers.
abstract_cn: 超辐射是一种基本的集体效应，其中辐射被多个发射器的相干性放大。超辐射在光学（可大幅减少线宽的激光器的设计）和量子力学中起着重要作用，甚至还可以用于解释宇宙学观测，例如黑洞的霍金辐射。与自旋组件耦合的谐振器有望成为未来涉及超辐射的集成量子器件的基础。因此，重要的是研究这种设备内的基本特性。尽管在强耦合状态下的实验显示了这些系统中的振荡行为，但迄今为止，迪克超辐射的清晰特征尚不存在。在这里，我们探索了由三维集总元件谐振器组成的系统中的超辐射，该谐振器在快速腔体极限中感应耦合到氮的空位中心的不均匀扩宽的集合中。我们观察到一个超辐射脉冲的发射速度比单个氮空位中心的衰减快一万亿倍。发射辐射强度相对于整体大小的非线性缩放进一步证实了这一点。我们的工作为包括固态超辐射微波激射器在内的未来量子技术奠定了基础。

title: Driven-dissipative non-equilibrium Bose–Einstein condensation of less than ten photons
title_cn: 少于十个光子的驱动耗散非平衡玻色-爱因斯坦凝聚
abstract: In a Bose–Einstein condensate, bosons condense in the lowest-energy mode available and exhibit high coherence. Quantum condensation is inherently a multimode phenomenon, yet understanding of the condensation transition in the macroscopic limit is hampered by the difficulty in resolving populations of individual modes and the coherences between them. Here, we report non-equilibrium Bose–Einstein condensation of 7 ± 2 photons in a sculpted dye-filled microcavity, where the extremely small particle number and large mode spacing of the condensate allow us to measure occupancies and coherences of the individual energy levels of the bosonic field. Coherence of the individual modes is found to generally increase with increasing photon number. However, at the break-down of thermal equilibrium we observe phase transitions to a multimode condensate regime wherein coherence unexpectedly decreases with increasing population, suggesting the presence of strong intermode phase or number correlations despite the absence of a direct nonlinearity. Experiments are well-matched to a detailed non-equilibrium model. We find that microlaser and Bose–Einstein statistics each describe complementary parts of our data and are limits of our model in appropriate regimes, providing elements to inform the debate on the differences between the two concepts.
abstract_cn: 在Bose爱因斯坦冷凝物中，玻色子以可用的最低能量模式冷凝，并表现出高相干性。量子凝聚本质上是一种多模现象，但由于难以解析单个模的总体以及它们之间的相干性，因此无法在宏观范围内理解凝聚跃迁。在这里，我们报告了在雕刻的充满染料的微腔中7＆＃8201;＆＃177;＆＃8201; 2光子的非平衡Bose爱因斯坦缩合，其中极小的颗粒数量和大的模态间距允许我们来测量波场的各个能级的占有率和相干性。发现各个模式的相干性通常随着光子数的增加而增加。但是，在热平衡破裂时，我们观察到了向多模态冷凝态的相变，其中相干性随人口的增加而出乎意料地降低，表明尽管没有直接的非线性，但存在强的模间相或数相关性。实验与详细的非平衡模型非常匹配。我们发现，微激光和Bose爱因斯坦的统计数据都描述了我们数据的互补部分，并且是我们在适当体制中的模型的局限性，从而为辩论这两个概念之间的差异提供了依据。

title: Visualization of the periodic modulation of Cooper pairing in a cuprate superconductor
title_cn: 铜酸盐超导体中库珀对的周期性调制的可视化
abstract: In cuprate superconductors, the existence of various intertwined orders associated with spin, charge and Cooper pairs is an obstacle in understanding the mechanism of Cooper pairing. The ubiquitous charge order is particularly important. Various theories have been proposed to explain the origin of the charge order and its implications for the superconducting phase, including charge stripes, electronic nematicity and Fermi surface instability. A highly appealing physical picture is the ‘pair density wave’, a spatially periodic modulation of Cooper pairing, which may also induce a charge order. To elucidate the existence and nature of the pair density wave, we use scanning tunnelling microscopy to investigate a severely underdoped cuprate, in which superconductivity just emerges on top of a pronounced chequerboard charge order. We observe a periodic modulation of both the superconducting coherence peak and gap depth, indicating the existence of a density wave order of Cooper pairing based on the empirical relationship between superconducting coherence and superfluid density. The pair density wave has the same spatial periodicity as the charge order, and the amplitudes of the two orders exhibit clear positive correlation. These results shed new light on the origin of and interplay between the charge order and Cooper pairing modulation in the cuprates.
abstract_cn: 在铜酸盐超导体中，与自旋，电荷和库珀对相关的各种交织顺序的存在是理解库珀配对机理的障碍。无处不在的充电顺序尤其重要。已经提出了各种理论来解释电荷序的起源及其对超导相的影响，包括电荷条纹，电子向列性和费米表面不稳定性。极具吸引力的物理图片是“对密度波”，它是Cooper配对在空间上的周期性调制，也可能引起电荷顺序。为了阐明线对密度波的存在和性质，我们使用扫描隧道显微镜来研究严重掺杂不足的铜酸盐，其中超导电刚好出现在明显的棋盘电荷阶上。我们观察到超导相干峰和间隙深度的周期性调制，表明基于超导相干和超流密度之间的经验关系，库珀配对的密度波阶的存在。对密度波具有与电荷阶相同的空间周期性，并且两个阶的振幅表现出明显的正相关。这些结果为铜价中电荷顺序和库珀配对调制的起源和相互作用提供了新的线索。

title: Charge trapping and super-Poissonian noise centres in a cuprate superconductor
title_cn: 铜酸盐超导体中的电荷俘获和超泊松噪声中心
abstract: The electronic properties of cuprate high-temperature superconductors in their normal state are highly two-dimensional: transport along the crystal planes is perfectly metallic, but is insulating along the perpendicular ‘c-axis’ direction. The ratio of the in-plane to the perpendicular resistance can exceed 104 (refs ). This anisotropy was identified as one of the mysteries of the cuprates early on, and although widely different proposals exist for its microscopic origin, there is little empirical information on the microscopic scale. Here, we elucidate the properties of the insulating layers with a newly developed scanning noise spectroscopy technique that can spatially map the current and its time-resolved fluctuations. We discover atomic-scale noise centres that exhibit megahertz current fluctuations 40 times the expectation from Poissonian noise, more than what has been observed in mesoscopic systems. Such behaviour can happen only in highly polarizable insulators and represents strong evidence for trapping of charge in the charge reservoir layers. Our measurements suggest a picture of metallic layers separated by polarizable insulators within a three-dimensional superconducting state.
abstract_cn: 铜酸盐高温超导体在其正常状态下的电子特性具有很高的二维性：沿晶面的传输是完全金属的，但沿垂直的＆lt; c轴＆amp; 8217;却是绝缘的；方向。面内电阻与垂直电阻之比可以超过10 4 （参考）。这种各向异性在早期就被认为是铜酸盐的奥秘之一，尽管对于其微观起源存在着广泛的不同建议，但在微观规模上几乎没有经验信息。在这里，我们使用一种新开发的扫描噪声光谱技术阐明了绝缘层的特性，该技术可以在空间上绘制电流及其时间分辨的波动。我们发现原子级噪声中心的兆赫兹电流波动是泊松噪声期望值的40倍，比介观系统中所观察到的要多。这种行为只能在高度极化的绝缘体中发生，并为电荷在电荷存储层中的捕获提供了有力的证据。我们的测量结果显示了在三维超导状态下被可极化绝缘体隔开的金属层的图片。

title: Leidenfrost wheels
abstract: As reported in 1756 by Johann Gottlob Leidenfrost, volatile liquids on hot solids form “gleaming drops resembling quicksilver”, a consequence of their levitation on a vapour cushion. This makes the drops spectacularly mobile, moving away as soon as they are deposited—an observation commonly attributed to gravity or surrounding airflows. This mobility has been exploited to manipulate drops, because tiny forces such as those generated on asymmetric substrates can move them in well-defined directions, a situation that also provides heat evacuation. Here we report that Leidenfrost droplets initially at rest on horizontal substrates self-rotate and self-propel in the direction they are rolling, in the absence of any source of asymmetry or external force. Their rapid internal flow is found to be accompanied by a tilting of their base, which creates a permanent ratchet-like mechanism, entraining the rolling liquid despite the fact that it is not in contact with its substrate.
abstract_cn: 如1756年约翰·戈特洛布·莱顿弗罗斯特（Johann Gottlob Leidenfrost）所报道的那样，热固体上的挥发性液体会形成类似于水银的闪闪发光滴，这是由于它们悬浮在气垫上的结果。这使液滴具有惊人的移动性，一旦沉积下来便立即移开，这通常归因于重力或周围的气流。这种流动性已经被用来操纵液滴，因为微小的力（例如在非对称基板上产生的力）可以使液滴沿明确的方向移动，这种情况也提供了热量散发。在这里，我们报告说，在没有任何不对称性或外力来源的情况下，最初静止在水平基材上的莱顿弗罗斯特液滴在旋转时会自动旋转并沿其滚动方向自动推进。发现它们的快速内部流动伴随着其基座的倾斜，从而形成了一种永久的棘轮状机制，从而夹带了轧制液，尽管它没有与基体接触。</ p>

title: Collective mechanical adaptation of honeybee swarms
title_cn: 蜜蜂群的集体机械适应
abstract: Honeybee Apis mellifera swarms form large congested tree-hanging clusters made solely of bees attached to each other. How these structures are maintained under the influence of dynamic mechanical forcing is unknown. To address this, we created pendant clusters and subject them to dynamic loads of varying orientation, amplitude, frequency and duration. We find that horizontally shaken clusters adapt by spreading out to form wider, flatter cones that recover their original shape when unloaded. Measuring the response of a cluster to an impulsive pendular excitation shows that flattened cones deform less and relax faster than the elongated ones (that is, they are more stable). Particle-based simulations of a passive assemblage suggest a behavioural hypothesis: individual bees respond to local variations in strain by moving up the strain gradient, which is qualitatively consistent with our observations of individual bee movement during dynamic loading. The simulations also suggest that vertical shaking will not lead to significant differential strains and thus no shape adaptation, which we confirmed experimentally. Together, our findings highlight how a super-organismal structure responds to dynamic loading by actively changing its morphology to improve the collective stability of the cluster at the expense of increasing the average mechanical burden of an individual.
abstract_cn: 蜜蜂的蜜蜂蜂群形成了巨大的，拥挤的挂树簇，它们仅由彼此附着的蜜蜂组成。在动态机械力的影响下如何保持这些结构尚不清楚。为了解决这个问题，我们创建了悬垂簇，并使其受到不同方向，幅度，频率和持续时间的动态载荷。我们发现，水平摇动的团簇通过散布形成更宽，更平的圆锥体而适应，这些圆锥体在卸载时恢复其原始形状。测量簇对脉冲摆激励的响应表明，扁平圆锥体比细长圆锥体变形更少，松弛速度更快（也就是说，它们更稳定）。基于粒子的无源组合的模拟提出了一种行为假设：单个蜜蜂通过使应变梯度上移来响应应变的局部变化，这在质量上与我们对动态加载过程中单个蜜蜂运动的观察一致。模拟还表明，垂直摇动不会导致明显的差异应变，因此不会产生形状适应性，我们通过实验证实了这一点。在一起，我们的发现强调了超生物结构如何通过主动改变其形态来改善簇的集体稳定性，而以增加个体的平均机械负担为代价来响应动态载荷。

title: Biexciton fine structure in monolayer transition metal dichalcogenides
title_cn: 单层过渡金属二卤化物中的双激子精细结构
abstract: The optical properties of atomically thin transition metal dichalcogenide (TMDC) semiconductors are shaped by the emergence of correlated many-body complexes due to strong Coulomb interaction. Exceptional electron–hole exchange predestines TMDCs to be used to study fundamental and applied properties of Coulomb complexes such as valley depolarization of excitons and fine-structure splitting of trions. Biexcitons in these materials are less well understood and it has been established only recently that they are spectrally located between excitons and trions. Here we show that biexcitons in monolayer TMDCs exhibit a distinct and rich fine structure on the order of millielectronvolts due to electron–hole exchange. Ultrafast pump–probe experiments on monolayer WSe2 reveal decisive biexciton signatures and a fine structure in excellent agreement with a microscopic theory. We provide a pathway to understand the complex spectral structure of higher-order Coulomb complexes in TMDCs going beyond the usual classification scheme in terms of four-particle configurations.
abstract_cn: 由于强大的库仑相互作用，相关的多体配合物的出现使原子薄的过渡金属二卤化二硫（TMDC）半导体的光学特性得以形成。出色的电子空穴交换预先确定了TMDC，可用于研究库仑配合物的基本和应用性质，例如激子的谷极去极化和tri的精细结构分裂。这些材料中的双激子激子鲜为人知，仅在最近才确定它们在光谱上位于激子和三子之间。在这里，我们显示由于电子空穴交换，单层TMDC中的双激子在毫伏级上表现出独特而丰富的精细结构。在单层WSe 2 上进行的超快泵实验显示了决定性的双激子签名和与微观理论极好的一致性的精细结构。我们提供了一条途径，以了解在四粒子构型方面超越常规分类方案的TMDC中高阶库仑复合物的复杂光谱结构。

title: Imaging quantum fluctuations near criticality
title_cn: 成像接近临界的量子涨落
abstract: A quantum phase transition (QPT) occurs between two competing phases of matter at zero temperature, driven by quantum fluctuations. Although the presence of these fluctuations is well established, they have not been locally imaged in space, and their local dynamics has not been studied so far. We use a scanning superconducting quantum interference device to image quantum fluctuations near the QPT from a superconductor to an insulator. We find fluctuations of the diamagnetic response in both space and time that survive well below the transition temperature, demonstrating their quantum nature. The fluctuations appear as telegraph-like noise with a range of characteristic times and a non-monotonic temperature dependence, revealing unexpected quantum granularity. The lateral dimension of these fluctuations grows towards criticality, offering a new measurable length scale. Our results provide physical insight into the reorganization of phases across a QPT, with implications for any theoretical description. This paves a new route for future quantum information applications.
abstract_cn: 量子相变（QPT）在零温度下由量子涨落驱动，在物质的两个竞争相之间发生。尽管已经很好地确定了这些波动的存在，但尚未对其在空间上进行局部成像，并且至今尚未研究其局部动力学。我们使用扫描超导量子干涉装置来成像从超导体到绝缘体的QPT附近的量子涨落。我们发现抗磁性响应在空间和时间上的波动都可以很好地维持在转变温度以下，这表明了它们的量子性质。波动表现为类似电报的噪声，具有一定的特征时间范围和非单调的温度依赖性，从而揭示了意外的量子粒度。这些波动的横向尺寸逐渐趋于临界，从而提供了一种新的可测量的长度尺度。我们的结果提供了对整个QPT中各阶段重组的物理洞察力，对任何理论描述都具有启示意义。这为未来的量子信息应用开辟了一条新途径。</ p>

title: Membrane-induced hydroelastic migration of a particle surfing its own wave
title_cn: 膜在其自身波中的膜诱导水弹性迁移
abstract: While coupling between fluid flow and soft elastic surfaces is common in biology and engineering, an analytical description is challenging as it often involves non-linear dynamics. Here we show using theory and experiments that a small particle moving along an elastic membrane through a viscous fluid is repelled from the membrane due to hydroelastic forces. The flow field produces an elastic disturbance in the membrane leading to particle–wave coupling. We derive an analytic expression for the particle trajectory and find that the normal migration velocity of the particle is quadratic in its speed and depends on a combination of the tension and bending resistance of the membrane. Experimentally, we measure the normal displacement of spheres sedimenting under gravity along a suspended elastic membrane and find quantitative agreement with the theoretical predictions with no fitting parameters. We experimentally demonstrate that the effect is strong enough for separation and sorting of particles on the basis of both their size and density. We discuss the significance of our results for particles interacting with biological membranes, and propose the use of our model for membrane elasticity measurements.
abstract_cn: 虽然在生物学和工程学中流体流动与软弹性表面之间的耦合很普遍，但由于其分析往往涉及非线性动力学，因此进行分析描述颇具挑战性。在这里，我们使用理论和实验表明，由于水弹性力，沿着粘性膜通过粘性流体运动的小颗粒会从膜上被排斥。流场在膜中产生弹性干扰，从而导致粒子波耦合。我们推导了粒子轨迹的解析表达式，发现粒子的正常迁移速度是二次方的，并且取决于膜的张力和抗弯曲性。实验上，我们测量了重力作用下沿悬浮弹性膜沉降的球体的法向位移，并找到了与无拟合参数的理论预测的定量一致性。我们通过实验证明，这种效果足以根据颗粒的大小和密度对颗粒进行分离和分类。我们讨论了我们的结果对于颗粒与生物膜相互作用的意义，并提出了我们的模型在膜弹性测量中的应用。</ p>

title: Polygonal motion and adaptable phototaxis via flagellar beat switching in the microswimmer Euglena gracilis
title_cn: 通过微游泳者Euglena gracilis的鞭毛节拍切换实现多边形运动和适应性趋光性
abstract: Biological microswimmers exhibit versatile strategies for sensing and navigating their environment, such as run-and-tumble and curvature modulation. Here, we report a striking phototactic behaviour of the microswimmer Euglena gracilis, where these eukaryotic cells swim in polygonal trajectories due to a sudden increase in light intensity. While smoothly curved trajectories are common for microswimmers, such quantized ones have not been reported previously. We find that this polygonal behaviour emerges from periodic switching between the flagellar beating patterns of helical swimming and spinning behaviours. We develop and experimentally validate a biophysical model that describes the phase relationship between the eyespot, cell orientation, light detection and cellular reorientation, accounting for all three behavioural states. Coordinated switching between these behaviours selects for ballistic, superdiffusive, diffusive or subdiffusive motion (including tuning the effective diffusion constant over several orders of magnitude), thereby enabling navigation in spatially structured light fields, such as edge avoidance and gradient descent. This feedback control links multiple system scales (flagellar beats, cellular behaviours and phototaxis strategies), with implications for other natural and synthetic microswimmers.
abstract_cn: 生物微游泳者展现出多种感知和导航其环境的策略，例如奔跑和摔倒和曲率调制。在这里，我们报道了微游动Euglena gracilis的惊人的光战术行为，由于光强度的突然增加，这些真核细胞在多边形轨迹中游动。尽管微游泳者通常会遇到弯曲的轨迹，但这种量化的轨迹以前没有被报道过。我们发现这种多边形行为是由螺旋游泳和旋转行为的鞭毛跳动模式之间的周期性切换产生的。我们开发并实验验证了描述眼点，细胞方向，光检测和细胞重新定向之间的相位关系的生物物理模型，并考虑了所有三种行为状态。这些行为之间的协调切换选择弹道，超扩散，扩散或亚扩散运动（包括在几个数量级上调整有效扩散常数），从而能够在空间结构化的光场中进行导航，例如避免边缘和梯度下降。这种反馈控制将多个系统规模（鞭毛节拍，细胞行为和趋光性策略）联系起来，对其他天然和合成微游泳者都有影响。

title: 3D field phase-space control in tokamak plasmas
title_cn: 托卡马克等离子体中的3D场相空间控制
abstract: A small relaxation of the axisymmetric magnetic field of a tokamak into a non-axisymmetric three-dimensional (3D) configuration can be effective to control magnetohydrodynamic instabilities, such as edge-localized modes. However, a major challenge to the concept of 3D tokamaks is that there are virtually unlimited possible choices for a 3D magnetic field, and most of them will only destabilize or degrade plasmas by symmetry breaking. Here, we demonstrate the phase-space visualization of the full 3D field-operating windows of a tokamak, which allows us to predict which configurations will maintain high confinement without magnetohydrodynamic instabilities in an entire region of plasmas. We test our approach at the Korean Superconducting Tokamak Advanced Research (KSTAR) facility, whose 3D coils with many degrees of freedom in the coil space make it unique for this purpose. Our experiments show that only a small subset of coil configurations can accomplish edge-localized mode suppression without terminating the discharge with core magnetohydrodynamic instabilities, as predicted by the perturbative 3D expansion of plasma equilibrium and the optimizing principle of local resonance. The prediction provided excellent guidance, implying that our method can substantially improve the efficiency and fidelity of the 3D optimization process in tokamaks.
abstract_cn: 托卡马克的轴对称磁场向非轴对称三维（3D）构型的小幅松弛可以有效控制磁流体动力学的不稳定性，例如边缘局部模式。但是，3D托卡马克概念的主要挑战在于，对于3D磁场实际上存在无限的可能选择，并且其中大多数只会通过对称性破坏来使等离子体不稳定或退化。在这里，我们演示了托卡马克的完整3D场操作窗口的相空间可视化，这使我们能够预测哪些配置将在整个等离子体区域中保持高约束而无磁流体动力学不稳定。我们在韩国超导托卡马克高级研究（KSTAR）设施中测试了我们的方法，该设施的3D线圈在线圈空间中具有许多自由度，因此在此用途上是独一无二的。我们的实验表明，只有一小部分线圈配置可以完成边沿定位模式抑制，而不会终止磁芯磁流体动力学不稳定性的放电，这是由等离子体平衡的3D扩张扰动和局部共振的优化原理所预测的。该预测提供了很好的指导，表明我们的方法可以大大提高托卡马克3D优化过程的效率和保真度。</ p>
